entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers overnight except a few flurries over southwestern sections. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers except a few flurries over southwestern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the evening then changing to snow overnight. Periods of snow over southwestern sections late in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over southwestern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023
